title: MCP Explicit Session and Window Targeting for fugue_create_pane
description: The fugue_create_pane MCP tool lacks explicit session and window targeting parameters. While handle_create_pane_with_options already supports session_filter and window_filter parameters, the MCP bridge hardcodes these to None, always using the 'first session' heuristic. This prevents Claude from orchestrating panes across multiple sessions.
user_impact: Enables Claude to orchestrate panes across multiple sessions (e.g., 'create a new session in the background, launch 4 panes each with a relevant command'). Essential for reliable multi-session workflows.
